name: Tengoku: Eternal Sunset
description:
Fullscreen is recommended. The browser version may not run well on older devices, so a download for windows is also available. If the game loses focus, try left clicking on the window, or refreshing the page.

Every 1000 years, Earth is invaded by enemy forces...

When that happens, a magical girl is chosen to become an "Angel", a person who will protect Earth.

They are given the magical ability of flight, power and agility. 

As the sun sets for what could be the last time, it is time for another "Angel" to be chosen...

Controls Arrow keysMoveZShootXBombShift
Slow modeSpacePause game Credits

Programming and Music by Dogtopius

Dogtopius

Clouds In The Blue Sky by Michał Grosicki
